segments.text: I see the girl reaching up, waiting for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so excited, like she’s about to get a treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she realizes how dangerous this is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is balancing on that stool, and it’s clearly not safe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don’t get caught by the woman.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water on the floor is just making everything worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe the woman hasn’t turned off the faucet yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is just chaotic, but the kids seem happy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they’ll get away with it or if someone will notice.
segments.speaker: PAR
